Package wellen

Class DSPTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • wellen.DSPTrack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DSPNodeOutputSignal
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DSPComposition
    public abstract class DSPTrack
extends java.lang.Object
implements DSPNodeOutputSignal
    a track allows to compose complex DSP modules. it is a container that may be managed by a DSPComposition.

    a track must implement the method 

    void output(Signal)
    which supplies an audio signal and may implement the method 
    void beat(int)
    which can be used to receive beat events.
